checklistName: Product Team Director for New Hire
checklistDescription: Items for the product team director for a new hire.

sayHi.description: Reaches out to new hire to say hello and set up coffee chat

assignFacilitator.description: Assign the new hire to a facilitator group

explainBillableHours.description: Explain billable hours during coffee chat. Discuss billable hour targets, what activities are billable, and setting billable hour expectations with project teams.

welcomeEmail.description: Send out welcome email introducting the new hire to the team

oneOnOne.description: Schedule a recurring skip level meeting with new hire

productTeamCoffee.description: Invite the new hire to the Product Team coffee meeting

sharePmGuide.description: Share the Product Guide with the new hire as recommended reading

addToOrgChart.description: Add the new hire to the Org Chart

addToSlackChannels.displayName: Add To Slack Channels and Groups

addToGoogleGroup.description: Add to the 18f-product and 18f-product-friends Google Groups

assignToMember.displayName: Assign a Product Team member to shadow and pair with
assignToMember.description: If the new hire does not yet have a project, assign them a PM to shadow and pair with

discussCoaching.displayName: Discuss the Coaching Program with the new hire
discussCoaching.description: Let the new hire know the Coaching Program is available for optional support with their transition into government and their new role

performancePlan.description: Create a performance plan and IDP for the new hire, review with the new hire, and file necessary paperwork

hiringFeedback.description: Get feedback from new hire on hiring process

shareOKRs.description: Share the latest Product Team OKRs with the new hire

addToTrello.description: Add the new hire to the Product Team Trello board
